snippet: While the police in France have refused to release his identity, the French news media reported that it was Prince Abdul Aziz, 41, who was ambushed by gunmen in a Hollywood-style robbery.
abstract: French news media reports that anonymous prince who was robbed at gunpoint in Paris was Prince Abdul Aziz, youngest and reportedly favorite son of the late King Fahd of Saudi Arabia; gunmen are said to have made off with some $335,000 in cash and sensitive documents whose existence has been denied by the Saudi Embassy.

byline.original: By DAN BILEFSKY and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: While the police in France have refused to release his identity, the French news media reported that it was Prince Abdul Aziz, 41, who was ambushed by gunmen in a Hollywood-style robbery.

headline.main: Saudi Prince Is Identified as Target of Paris Heist
headline.print_headline: Saudi Prince Is Identified as Target of Paris Heist

keywords.value: Four Seasons Hotel George V (Paris, France)
